info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 01 at 1:55PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Idaho... Bear River at Border affecting Bear Lake Valley zone. Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Bear River Border 7.5 5.0 Mon 1 pm MDT 6.6 7.6 7.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ061-022100- /O.NEW.KPIH.FL.A.0001.230503T1520Z-000000T0000Z/ /BRBW4.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 155 PM MDT Mon May 1 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Bear River at Border. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Water will begin to encroach on Pegram Road just north of Pegram. Lowland flooding of fields and pasture land will occur. Driveways to low lying homes next to the river near Dingle may have water across them. Some basements of low lying homes next to the river will start to have water come in them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Monday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
